# teamcity_secure_token (Resource)

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "teamcity_secure_token" "a" {
  project_id = "Project1"
  value = var.password
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `project_id` (String)
- `value` (String, Sensitive)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
